content: पीडा [पीड् --भावे भिदा° अङ्] {@--1@} Pain, trouble, suffering, annoyance, molestation, agony; आश्रमपीडा <ls>R. 1. 37</ls> ‘disturbance’; <ls n="R. 1.">71</ls>; मदन°, दारिद्र्य° &c. {@--2@} Injury, damage, harm; <ls>Bg. 17. 19</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 169.</ls> {@--3@} Devastation, laying waste. {@--4@} Violation, infringement. {@--5@} Restriction. {@--6@} Pity, compassion. {@--7@} Eclipse. {@--8@} A chaplet, garland for the head. {@--9@} The {%Sarala%} tree. {@--10@} A basket,
